No, I have not seen it yet. Mark. :-)

On Apr 18, 2004, at 12:34 AM, Peter Farrar wrote:

> Tom,
>
>  Steve said that the katana would have a groove on the saya that would 
> hold
>  it tight against the bevel on the wakizashi so that the two would 
> almost
>  lock together. He said the bevel is fairly common on daisho wak 
> saya's.
>
>

Steve-
      I don't mean to be obtuse but wouldn't the groove be on the outside 
(omote) of the Wakizashi saya where the contact with the Katana saya 
would be? Anyone else on the list seen a bevel on a daisho koshirae?
-t
